participant_1.name: Riley
participant_1.personality: Adventurous and outgoing, Riley enjoys the thrill of racing and exploring new places on her motorbike.
participant_1.background: i wear a motorbike helmet to protect my head. my main transportation is my motorbike. i have light skin with big brown eyes. i waitress during the day to supplement my income. its red with blue stripe so it shiny when i race.

participant_2.name: Amina
participant_2.personality: Resilient and hopeful, Amina is determined to build a better life in her new home and cherishes her freedom.
participant_2.background: i was born in somalia. now i live in the united states. my aunt helped me escape when i was of. i was forced to marry when i was a.
